No MySQL: No MySQL installation detected. Installation instructions can be found at https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/. This application is NOT compatible with MySQL versions higher than 8.0.15.
Incorrect Username or Password: Incorrect username or password. Please verify your MySQL credentials and try again.
Too Many Failed Login Attempts: Too many failed MySQL login attempts. The application will quit now.
Download Complete: The updated application has been downloaded. To apply updates, quit this version and overwrite it with the new version.
